cast.name: 法里德·扎卡利亚 Fareed Zakaria
乔治·W· 布什 George W. Bush

this_title: Why Iran Hates America: A Fareed Zakaria Special
trans_title: 缘何伊朗憎恨美国：Fareed Zakaria特别节目
introduction: Amidst ongoing tensions in the Middle East, Fareed Zakaria unpacks Iran's relationship with America, tracing it back to the 1979 embassy hostage crisis and U.S. support for Saddam Hussein's invasion of Iran.
chinese_title: 缘何伊朗憎恨美国：Fareed Zakaria特别节目
foreign_title: Why Iran Hates America: A Fareed Zakaria Special
